value.title: Eight-car Thanksgiving pileup blamed on Tesla “Full Self-Driving” software
value.excerpt: An eight-car collision on Thanksgiving Day (Nov. 24) is now being blamed on Tesla's "Full Self-Driving" (FSD) assistance system. The crash took place in the Bay Area in California on I-80 and left one person hospitalized and eight others with minor injuries.
